title: Gazebo7 with Ubuntu 16.04 Gui does not launch (No Protocol Specified)

content.raw:
Hello, 

I have just installed Gazebo 7 on ubuntu 16.04 and when I do `gazebo --verbose` I get the following message 

```
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.14.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.14.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.160.114
No protocol specified
[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:734] Can't open display: :0
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:97] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:301] Cannot initialize render engine since render path type is NONE. Ignore this warning ifrendering has been turned off on purpose.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.160.114
No protocol specified
[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:734] Can't open display: :0
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:97] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:301] Cannot initialize render engine since render path type is NONE. Ignore this warning ifrendering has been turned off on purpose.
No protocol specified
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:99] gazeb: cannot connect to X server :0
```

How could I go about launching gazebo? Thank you!

Hello,

I have just installed Gazebo 7 on ubuntu 16.04 and when I do gazebo --verbose I get the following message 

Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.14.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.

Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.160.114
No protocol specified
[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:734] Can't open display: :0
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:97] Unable to create X window. Rendering will be disabled
[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:301] Cannot initialize render engine since render path type is NONE. Ignore this warning ifrendering has been turned off on purpose.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.160.114
No protocol specified
[Err] [RenderEngine.cc:734] Can't open display: :0

[Wrn] [RenderEngine.cc:301] Cannot initialize render engine since render path type is NONE. Ignore this warning ifrendering has been turned off on purpose.
No protocol specified
[Wrn] [GuiIface.cc:99] gazeb: cannot connect to X server :0

How could I go about launching gazebo? Thank you!
